div.span:
6900 State Route 18
Hamler, OH 43524
Phone: 419-274-3015 | Fax: 877-275-8939

span.div: Patrick Henry Schools continues to monitor developments surrounding the coronavirus and the confirmed cases in Ohio.

On all health related matters, the district works closely with the Henry County Board of Health, the Ohio Department of Health, and the United States Center for Disease Control and Prevention. We stay up to date on the information and resources provided by these agencies and also follow their recommendations and guidelines to ensure a healthy school community.
